item.title: Fix AutoKey pasting blank lines in Ubuntu
item.description: I have been using AutoKey on my Linux desktop to provide automated text insertion capabilities similar to what I get from AutoHotKey on my Windows systems. I prefer to keep things like my email and ticket signatures stored as hotkeys so I can more granularly choose when to use them. The version of AutoKey included in the Ubuntu repositories has an issue where blank lines are inserted rather than the expected text.
